title: BPCL Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for Management Trainee Posts
text: BPCL Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for Management Trainee Posts BPCL Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for Management Trainee Posts: Government of India Enterprise, Bharat Petroleum Corporation Ltd (BPCL) has invited applications for the recruitment of Management Trainee vacancies in Mechanical & Chemical disciplines based on GATE-2017. Eligible candidates can apply online for BPCL from 06-01-2017 to 03-02-2017. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process & how to apply are given below… BPCL Vacancy Details: Name of the Post: Management Trainee 1. Mechanical Engineering 2. Chemical Engineering Age Limit: Candidates maximum age should be 25 years for General, 28 years for OBC, 30 years for SC/ ST candidates as on 01-06-2017. Age relaxation is up to 5 years for candidates domiciled in Jammu & Kashmir between 01-01-1980 and 31-12-1989 & for other information refer notification. Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess Full time B.E/ B.Tech/ B.Sc (Engg) in relevant discipline through AICTE/ UGC approved Indian Universities/ Institutes. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on GATE-2017 score, Group Discussion, Personal Interview & Medical Fitness in Pre -Employment Medical Examination. How to Apply: Candidates who are applied for GATE-2017 may apply online for BPCL through the website www.bharatpetroleum.com from 06-01-2017 to 03-02-2017. Instructions to Apply Online for BPCL: 1. Login through the website “www.bharatpetroleum.com”. 2. Click on “Careers –> Current Openings”. 3. Select desired posrt & click on Online Application link. 4. Fill all the details carefully & submit the form. 5. Take printout of application for future use. Important Dates: Start Date to Apply Online for GATE 2017 on the websites of IITs / IISc 01-09-2016 Last Date to Apply Online for GATE 2017 on the websites of IITs / IISc 04-10-2016 Date of Availability of Online Admit Card 05-01-2017 onwards Date of GATE 2017 Online Examination February 4 – 5, 2017 & February 11 – 12, 2017 Opening of BPCL recruitment website for Online Submission of Applications with GATE 2017 Registration number 06-01-2017 Last Date for BPCL Online Applications 03-02-2017 For more details like training and placements, emolument, medical standards, qualification & other information click on the link given below…
